Equity Bank offers a variety of products that helps you save and invest your money to ensure you grow your wealth
Save any amount as frequently as you can while earning a simple interest
Set your goals and start saving towards them immediately while earning interest
Access your deposit amount plus interest at the end of a fixed saving period
Start saving and have immediate access to your funds plus interest,without any penalty
Manage the devices connected to your profile
We\'ll email or text you a link to help you reset your password

Borrow up to 1,000,000 KES and pay it back in one month
Borrow up to 1,000,000 KES and pay it back over up to twelve months
Loan for members who receive a monthly pension
Short-tern loan for members who receive a monthly salary
This product is for approved retailers who sell products stocked by a local anchor or sub-anchor
This loan is available to Equity members who have had their Equity bank account for at least six months
You can borrow up to 1,000,000 KES, which can be paid in 1 month
You can check your loan limit to find out
This loan is available to Equity members who have had their Equity bank account for at least six months
You can borrow up to 1,000,000 KES, which can be paid over a period of 12 months
You can check your loan limit to find out

As a pensioner, it is important for you to enjoy your time in retirement while also being able to have everything you need and want. The Pension Loan is designed to help you meet your emergency needs, and is based on your account profile
For this loan, We offer a repayment period of up to 48 months.\n You can qualify for a maximum loan amount of 3,800,000 KES
You can check your loan limit to find out
This is a short-term loan to help you meet your emergency needs. The loan is based on your profile.
For this loan, We offer a repayment period of up to 12 months.\n To qualify, your salary must have been coming into your Equity Bank account for at least three months
You can qualify for a maximum amount of 4 times your monthly salary.
Any amount exceeding 300,000 KES must be secured with either a log book or title deed.
You can check your loan limit to find out

This product is for approved retailers who sell products stocked by a local anchor or sub-anchor. Through this facility, retailers can withdraw funds for stock financing requirements, quickly and conveniently, whenever it is needed.
A retailer has the option to insure the goods they order, to cover any loss or damage that can occur while the products are in transit

How much can I borrow?
- A minimum amount of KES
-A maximum amount of 1,000,000 KES (This depends on the anchor
- Any amount above 1,000,000 KES should be fully secured
Any amount exceeding 300,000 KES must be secured with either a log book or title deed.

The ecosystem loan is a revolving stock financing facility. Each drawn will be repaid within the agreed period, which is a maximum of 30 days, depending on the customer segement. The overall loan limit is approved for a 3-month period, which can be renewed based on the review of previous performance
You can check your loan limit to find out
Save any amount and deposit as frequently as you can, while earning compounded interest on deposits.
The interest you\'ll earn with a Classic savings account is calculated on a simple interest basis. It is based on the amount you deposit into the account and is subject to change.
Interest will only be earned for an account balance of above 20,000.00 KES and is credited at the end of the year and/or at account closure.
For more information on the interest rate,\nClick here.
Why should you get this account?

• Deposit funds into the account as often as you would like to.
• Your savings are easily available on request.
• Earn a daily annual return.
• No charges to move money from your savings account to a bank account.
Bonus:\n• There are no monthly charges or fees to operate this account.
All you need is a minimum opening balance of 1,000 KES and an active Equity online profile.
One free withdrawal is allowed per month. A withdrawal charge of 60.00 KES is applied for any subsequent withdrawals within the same month.
If your withdrawals leave less than 20,000 KES in the account, you will forfeit any interest earned.
With a full withdrawal, the account will be closed and the funds will be transferred to your source account.
This savings account allows you to deposit a principal amount, earn interest, and access your money anytime.
For more information on the interest rate, click here.

• During the investment period, interest is accrued daily.
• No maximum deposit amount.
• Unlimited account access on mobile and online.
• Monthly free e-statements.
• No monthly charges on your account.
• You have disposable income.\n• You\'re looking for a great way to earn a return on your savings.
You need to be 18 years of age with an active Equity profile and a minimum balance of 50,000 KES. The maximum deposit period is 12 months.

Top up your account as often as you would like via the available Move money options. Partial withdrawals are allowed. However, if your account is closed, the funds will be transferred to your source account.
You can manually close your account after one full day of the account being opened. Funds will then be transferred to the source account.
This account is ideal if you\'re looking for a way to earn a profitable amount of interest on some spare money you have.
The account earns daily simple interest.
For more information on the interest rate,\nClick here.
Why should you get this account?

• The minimum period for a Fixed deposit is only one month.
• The deposit amount and interest rate are fixed during the investment period.
• At the time of opening this account, you are informed of the interest you will earn.
• Principal and interest payment is done upon maturity or account closure.
• KES is supported.
• No monthly charges.
• You can choose to reinvest your savings into a new Fixed deposit account at the end of your deposit period.
What should you get this account?
All you need is a minimum opening balance of 50,000 KES and an active Equity online profile.

If you withdraw your funds before reaching your selected deposit period, the account will be closed and the accrued interest will be reduced. The funds will then be transferred to your source account.
This savings account allows you to set a goal, deposit funds, and seamlessly save towards your financial goals.
For more information on the interest rate,\nClick here.

• Earn daily simple interest as you save towards your goal.
• No maximum savings account.
• Unlimited account access on mobile and online.
• No monthly charges on the account.

• You have a regular and stable income.
• You have disposable income.
• You're looking for a great way to save towards your financial goals.
You need to be 18 years of age with an active Equity profile and a minimum opening balance of 300.00 KES. This account does not have a minimum term length.
Top up your account as often as you like with Move money. You can make 1 free withdrawal every 6 months. After that, a withdrawal charge of 60.00 KES is applied.
You can close your account manually at any time. Funds will then be transferred to the source account.
